params.addresses: The addresses to get the Ether balance for

returns.balances: The Ether balance for all addresses in the same order as specified

items(address[],address[]).details: This does not check if the `token` address specified is actually an ERC-20 token

params.addresses: The addresses to get the token balance for
params.contracts: The addresses of the ERC-721 token contracts

returns.balances: The token balance for all addresses in the same order as specified

tokens(address[],address[]).details: This does not check if the `token` address specified is actually an ERC-20 token

params.addresses: The addresses to get the token balance for
params.contracts: The addresses of the ERC-20 token contracts

returns.balances: The token balance for all addresses in the same order as specified

etherBalance(address[]).notice: Get the Ether balance for all addresses specified

items(address[],address[]).notice: Get the ERC-721 token balance of `token` for all addresses specified

tokens(address[],address[]).notice: Get the ERC-20 token balance of `token` for all addresses specified
